data.eml:eml: Colastomion Baker (Braconidae, Rogadinae): nine new species from Papua New Guinea reared from Crambidae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Quicke, Donald L. J., Smith, M. Alex, Miller, Scott E., Hrcek, Jan, Butcher, Buntika (2012): Colastomion Baker (Braconidae, Rogadinae): nine new species from Papua New Guinea reared from Crambidae. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 28: 85-121, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.28.3484, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.28.3484
